article.title: Goodrich to Support Pakistani F-16 Datalink, Potential Fusion Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Goodrich Corporation, Surveillance & Reconnaissance Systems of Chelmsford, Massachusetts, was awarded a nearly $72 million U.S. Air Force contract to provide five dual band-110 Pod, two datalink upgrades to existing pods, two fixed ground stations, one mobile ground station, four ground station datalink receiver kits, initial spares, technical manuals, minimal initial engineering support for final in-country installation, integration, testing and a study for a potential fusion center.Â This supports a Foreign Military Sale program and Pakistani F-16 aircraft.
